availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Mary B. Crow Gresham in Calloway County, Kentucky, on June 20, 1828. Father of Elizabeth Gresham, Edna Gresham, Sally Gresham, Mary G. Gresham, Rebecca Gresham, John Gresham, Blake W. Gresham, America Helen Gresham, and Virginia Gresham. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860. Employed Houston Riley as a farmhand in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 378B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 36.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Calloway County Marriages, Film #001942719, p. 37.
